${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:QuantumStrike.NAME: Quantum Strike
${modID}:QuantumStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 damage NL ${outerwildsmod}:or NL Deal 3 damage 3 times

${modID}:HourglassTwins.NAME: Hourglass Twins
${modID}:HourglassTwins.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL gain !B! Block NL ${modID}:Time +1B\-1D NL ${modID}:Reverse 10

${modID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
${modID}:Blink.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL ${modID}:Blink NL Upgrade when drawn. NL Exhaust

${modID}:GhostMatterVuln.NAME: Ghost Matter
${modID}:GhostMatterVuln.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust

${modID}:GhostMatterWeak.NAME: Ghost Matter
${modID}:GhostMatterWeak.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust

${modID}:CrashShip.NAME: Crash
${modID}:CrashShip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL apply !M! Vulnerable NL gain !M! Vulnerable

${modID}:InfiniteBlinks.NAME: Infinite Blinks
${modID}:InfiniteBlinks.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Blink into your hand.
${modID}:InfiniteBlinks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a *Blink into your hand.

${modID}:Gyroscope.NAME: Gyroscope
${modID}:Gyroscope.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Time +1D. NL Exhaust
${modID}:Gyroscope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Time +1D.

${modID}:Superposition.NAME: Superposition
${modID}:Superposition.DESCRIPTION: The first ${modID}:Quantum card played each turn triggers ALL options
